statements: SELECT genre_name, songs_count FROM music_genre_sales WHERE revenue > 5000
SELECT genre_id, genre_name, songs_count, revenue FROM music_genre_sales WHERE genre_name LIKE 'R%'
SELECT * FROM music_genre_sales WHERE songs_count < 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT genre_name, revenue FROM music_genre_sales WHERE songs_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY genre_name ASC
SELECT genre_name, songs_count, revenue FROM music_genre_sales WHERE revenue > 2000 AND genre_name IN ('Pop', 'Rock')
SELECT genre_name, songs_count FROM music_genre_sales WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY songs_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_genre_sales WHERE genre_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT genre_name, revenue FROM music_genre_sales ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS genre_count, SUM(songs_count) AS total_songs_count FROM music_genre_sales;
SELECT genre_name, songs_count, revenue FROM music_genre_sales WHERE revenue < 500 ORDER BY revenue ASC, songs_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM songs
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM songs WHERE genre_id = 1
SELECT song_name, release_date FROM songs ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT genre_name, SUM(sales_count) AS total_sales FROM sales_by_genre GROUP BY genre_name
SELECT * FROM sales_by_genre WHERE revenue >= 1000
SELECT genre_name, sales_count FROM sales_by_genre WHERE sales_count > 1000 ORDER BY sales_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(song_id) AS song_count FROM songs GROUP BY artist_name ORDER BY song_count DESC;
SELECT genre_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_by_genre GROUP BY genre_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM songs WHERE artist_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM tracks ORDER BY track_name DESC;
SELECT track_name, artist_name FROM tracks WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT track_name, release_date FROM tracks WHERE artist_name = 'Taylor Swift';
SELECT genre, SUM(total_revenue) AS total_revenue FROM revenue GROUP BY genre;
SELECT * FROM tracks ORDER BY release_date DESC, track_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT track_name, genre, artist_name, album_name FROM tracks WHERE genre='Rock' AND release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT track_name, sales.sale_amount, customer_name FROM tracks INNER JOIN sales ON tracks.track_id = sales.track_id WHERE sales.sale_amount > 50 ORDER BY sales.sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT genre, SUM(total_revenue) AS total_revenue FROM revenue GROUP BY genre HAVING total_revenue > 10000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM tracks WHERE artist_name LIKE 'A%' AND album_name LIKE '%Best%';
SELECT * FROM sales LIMIT 10;
SELECT genre, revenue FROM sales ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT timestamp, revenue FROM sales WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT artist_name FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 3;
SELECT track_name, genre_name FROM tracks JOIN genres ON tracks.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sale_id, genre, revenue FROM sales WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY genre ASC;
SELECT artist_id, artist_name FROM artists WHERE artist_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(genre_id) FROM genres GROUP BY genre_name HAVING COUNT(genre_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM tracks JOIN genres ON tracks.genre_id = genres.genre_id WHERE genre_name = 'Rock' ORDER BY track_name ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM Genre
SELECT id, title FROM Album ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT id, title, duration FROM Song WHERE duration > 180
SELECT title, amount FROM Revenue WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT Album.title, Artist.name, Genre.name FROM Album JOIN Artist ON Album.artist_id = Artist.id JOIN Genre ON Artist.genre_id = Genre.id
SELECT * FROM Genre ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT Artist.name, Album.title FROM Artist INNER JOIN Album ON Artist.id = Album.artist_id;
SELECT Song.title, Album.title FROM Song JOIN Album ON Song.album_id = Album.id WHERE Song.duration > 180;
SELECT Artist.name, Revenue.amount FROM Artist LEFT JOIN Revenue ON Artist.genre_id = Revenue.genre_id WHERE Revenue.amount > 1000;
SELECT AVG(duration) AS avg_duration, COUNT(*) AS total_songs FROM Song;
